headline.main: BRITISH HIT SHIPS OFF ITALIAN COAST; Bomb Cargo Vessel and Force Its Beaching -- Air Torpedo Strikes a Destroyer TOBRUK HEAVILY RAIDED Points in Sicily and Crete Also Are Attacked -- El Alamein Front Continues Quiet

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Sept. 30 (U.P.) -- British medium bomber planes have attacked an Italian merchant ship in the Ionian Sea, damaging it so badly that it had to be beached, and British torpedo planes have scored a direct hit amidships of an enemy destroyer off Cape Spartivento, Italy, it was announced today.
